faq.a: EPTEC is a platform for structured framework work, comparison, and methodological commitment.

faq.q: Can I use EPTEC without AI?
faq.a: Yes. All AI features are optional and can be disabled by the admin.
Only necessary technical data is processed. Content is not automatically shared.
Room 1 is for analysis, structuring, and framework work.
Room 2 is the binding application and evidence space.

agb: Use of the platform is subject to the applicable terms.
Content may not be shared or copied without permission.
Violations may lead to suspension or termination.
The platform provides tools, not legal advice.

text: This privacy policy explains the scope and purpose of personal data processing.
Only technically necessary data is processed.
No data is shared with third parties without a legal basis or consent.
